( This study formally call ReCKord include CyberKnife ; The ReCKord study continue CyberKnife subset RSSearch . )
DOC.brief_title: RSSearch Patient Registry-Long Term Study Use SRS/SBRT
DOC.detailed_description: The Registry design help SRS/SBRT ( Stereotactic Radiosurgery/Stereotactic Body Radiation Therapy ) user understand utilization key treatment outcomes treatment approach . Some objective include : Allow participant record information usage SRS/SBRT everyday practice , include patient characteristic disease information , treatment plan outcomes Provide participant ready access data publication experience tool establish collaboration participate site Facilitate quality improvement effort individual treatment provider Understand effectiveness different treatment plan different type lesion , diseases treatment The Registry track select outcome condition treat SRS/SBRT ( example , PSA prostate cancer ) ; Registry also provide individual participant ability add additional outcome condition specific interest institution . The Registry host Advertek , Inc independent vendor electronic registry ; responsible HIPAA compliance , include security mechanism . Patients enrol prospectively . Some retrospective patient data likely include order capture short long term outcome data .
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis benign malignant tumor condition deem treatable stereotactic radiosurgery stereotactic body radiotherapy Willingness sign Informed Consent Document There specific exclusion criterion , patient unwilling sign ICD include
